name: DOUBLE PLAY WORD GAMES
description:
This invention gives you more choices,
more chances, and more challenges.

Start with 150 levels of anagrams,
then graduate to unlimited solitaire.

Between game levels you won't get
annoyed by forced advertisements.

Instead you'll get entertained by cute
cuddly characters that you choose.

They either do their dance or deliver
useful tips, trivia, puzzles and puns.

You can submit your original punny
jokes for a chance to get a $25 reward!

Aside from information, you'll also get
inspiration from relevant quotations.

Have fun while expanding not only your
vocabulary but also your worldview.
